statements: SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE pollution_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM EnvironmentalData;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 60 AND pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM EnvironmentalData GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM EnvironmentalData GROUP BY location HAVING data_count > 5;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT decision_text, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_maker = 'Alice';
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM environmental_data;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT location, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT decision_text, decision_maker FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_maker = 'Admin' ORDER BY decision_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location, pollutant_level FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE location = 'Park';
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT effort_name, organization, funding FROM ConservationEfforts ORDER BY funding DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT location, MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_pollution FROM EnvironmentalData GROUP BY location HAVING max_pollution > 100
SELECT effort_name, organization, funding FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY funding DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, data_type, value FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers WHERE organization = 'Green Earth Foundation'
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM SustainabilityEfforts WHERE budget > 10000
SELECT * FROM ConservationMetrics WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY metric_name ASC
SELECT id, name, email FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, data_type, value FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE location = 'New York' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, budget FROM SustainabilityEfforts WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT metric_name, value, units FROM ConservationMetrics WHERE value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM environmental_data
SELECT * FROM species_info WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered'
SELECT observer_name, observation_date, observation_notes FROM observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE location='Forest' AND temperature > 25
SELECT species_name, kingdom FROM species_info WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_projects WHERE location='Ocean'
SELECT * FROM observations JOIN species_info ON observations.species_id = species_info.id WHERE kingdom='Animal'
